comment:
* Callback for returning the detection result.
     *
     * @hide

variables.name: mRemoteCallback
variables.comment: TODO: consider making the constructor a test api for testing purpose

methods.name: public void onDetected(@NonNull HotwordDetectedResult result)
methods.comment:
* Informs the {@link HotwordDetector} that the keyphrase was detected.
         *
         * @param result Info about the detection result. This is provided to the
         *         {@link HotwordDetector}.

methods.name: public void onRejected(@NonNull HotwordRejectedResult result)
methods.comment:
* Informs the {@link HotwordDetector} that the keyphrase was not detected. *

* This cannot not be used when recognition is done through * {@link #onDetect(ParcelFileDescriptor, AudioFormat, Callback)}. * * @param result Info about the second stage detection result. This is provided to * the {@link HotwordDetector}.
